name: Lockdown Day
description:
Lockdown Day

A submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020 by Team Albino Boar

Live out another samey, powerless day under lockdown: wake up, wash, eat, work, TV, repeat. Will today be the day you make it outside? Will today be a good day?

How to play

Click highlighted objects with your mouse, tap with your finger on mobile.

Attributions Art Work
  • Bedroom, Bathroom, Kitchen, Office, Lounge, Hallway: by Mucho Pixels, "House Interiors Tile Set Pack" from https://muchopixels.itch.io/house-interiors-tileset-pack
  • Font: by Ek Type, "Mukta" from https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Mukta
